title: I've been hacked.
body:
Someboduy probably hacked into my account and spent all my rp and tried to change the passcode while I was in school today. 
When I went into my email somebody tried to change the password the picture will show it. And now when I asked my friend that the presents were sent to doesnt even know a single thing about my ID and Password. So riot i got the screen shots of the RP gone and please give my RP back. 

I dont want to sue my friend for this plz solve it.

replies.body: hey atleast u still have ur email. my account was keylogged and the guy that took it knows about the email exploit. got my email changed without me knowing and riot still hasnt responded after 2 days. hes most liekly jerking fof with it and i cant do anything about it. i love that i paid money for this. 2 days not a single response.

Hey SKT T1 Pain,

It looks like your account may have been compromised. As such, all of the steps below are recommended for you to regain full control of your League of Legends account:

1. Download [MalwareBytes Free](https://www.malwarebytes.org/mwb-download/), or another antivirus application, and run a complete computer scan. Remove any malware following that scan. 
2. Change any passwords that you believe may have been compromised. You can change your League of Legends password by going to the [League of Legends account area](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/na/en/protect) in the top-right corner of this page. Click on your summoner name, and select "Settings". In the box that comes up, click "Change Password" and follow said steps. Note: You'll want to also change your email account password to ensure that your account cannot be compromised again. 
3. Now that your account is secure (hopefully), we'll deal with the issue of the unauthorized actions: 

_____________________________

As this is an account-specific inquiry, we can't assist you much further on the boards. You'll need to [submit a ticket to Riot Games Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) regarding your issue. A few tips as you submit your request: 

1. Be sure to submit as much information in your initial ticket as possible. For obvious reasons, each Rioter request for more information will delay the resolution of the issue. 
2. Create an account on the Riot Games Support website. It'll save you a lot of time in the future and keep your requests organized and easier to find/access. 
3. Be respectful and polite in your correspondences with Riot Support. 

Best of luck!
You should probably send in a ticket if you feel this way. That way you can get a one on one with someone. https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
